news.title: 谈判、枪击、丑闻，世界炸锅
登山者因弃女友于雪山致死受审
news.title0: Climber on trial for leaving girlfriend to die on Austria's highest mountain
news.content: 一名男子因在奥地利最高峰攀登时，将冻僵的女友遗弃在暴风雪中而被控重大过失杀人罪，案件审理引发对登山者责任的广泛讨论。
news.content0: More than a year after a 33-year-old woman froze to death on Austria's highest mountain, her boyfriend goes on trial on Thursday accused of gross negligent manslaughter.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 60年代加拿大塑料垃圾冲上苏格兰海滩
news.title0: 'It's overwhelming': Plastic from 1960s Canada washes up on Orkney beach
news.content: 苏格兰奥克尼群岛海滩近日出现大量可追溯至上世纪60-70年代的塑料瓶和碎片，据信源自加拿大，清理者称数量“令人不知所措”。
news.content0: Plastic bottles and debris which appears to have originated in Canada and dates back to the 1960s and 70s has washed up on an Orkney beach.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 科拜尔指控CBS因FCC压力禁播民主党人采访
news.title0: Stephen Colbert says CBS spiked interview with Democrat over FCC fears
news.content: 美国深夜脱口秀主持人斯蒂芬·科拜尔指控其所属的CBS电视台因担心联邦通信委员会报复，拒绝播出其对一名民主党议员的采访。
news.content0: US late-night host Stephen Colbert has accused his network of refusing to broadcast an interview with a Democratic politician over fears of retaliation by the Federal Communications Commission (FCC).
news.author: BBC

news.title: 威廉王子坦言花很长时间理解自身情绪
news.title0: William says it has taken 'long time to understand my emotions'
news.content: 威尔士亲王威廉在一档心理健康节目中坦诚分享，称自己花了很长时间去理解和处理情绪，并呼吁更多男性榜样公开谈论心理健康。
news.content0: The Prince of Wales has opened up about taking time to "understand my emotions" in a frank conversation about mental health.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美国土安全部发言人麦克劳克林将离职
news.title0: US Homeland Security spokeswoman Tricia McLaughlin to leave post
news.content: 美国国土安全部发言人特里西娅·麦克劳克林计划本周离职，她曾是特朗普政府移民打击行动中最突出的宣传者之一。
news.content0: Spokeswoman for the US Department of Homeland Security (DHS) Tricia McLaughlin - one of the most prominent figures in the White House crackdown on immigration - plans to leave her post this week.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 曼迪·摩尔夫妇在洛杉矶山火后重建梦想家园
news.title0: Mandy Moore and Taylor Goldsmith nearly lost their dream home in the LA fires. Here’s how they rebuilt
news.content: 美国女星曼迪·摩尔与音乐家丈夫泰勒·戈德史密斯在洛杉矶毁灭性山火后，重建了他们几乎被完全烧毁的梦想家园，并分享了重建历程。
news.content0: In 2020, Mandy Moore and her musician husband Taylor Goldsmith bought their dream home in Altadena, California, as a family of two, hiring a team to begin renovating the romantic Spanish Colonial Revival property and update its 1930s charm. In 2023, as a family of four, with another baby on the way, they moved in and began living their new life in Altadena’s enclave of historic architecture, mountain views and small-town charm.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 科罗拉多州30车连环相撞致4死
news.title0: 4 dead in 30-vehicle pileup in Colorado as powerful winds slam Plains, fueling multiple wildfires
news.content: 美国科罗拉多州因强风导致沙尘弥漫，能见度骤降，引发超过30辆车的连环相撞事故，造成至少4人死亡，29人受伤。
news.content0: At least four people are dead in a multi-vehicle pileup in Colorado and multiple fires are breaking out across the Plains as powerful winds wreak havoc across the region, forcing thousands to evacuate.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 美国冲浪者范戴克在哥斯达黎加家中遇害
news.title0: American surfer Kurt Van Dyke found dead in apparent robbery at his home in Costa Rica
news.content: 66岁的美国冲浪者库尔特·范戴克在哥斯达黎加加勒比海岸的公寓中被发现死亡，警方初步调查显示为一起抢劫案。
news.content0: American surfer Kurt Van Dyke was found dead in an apparent robbery at his apartment in Cahuita, a Caribbean coastal town in Costa Rica, on Saturday. He was 66.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 里约狂欢节“博伊托洛”街头派对无休无止
news.title0: A Rio Carnival Party That Goes On and On
news.content: 巴西里约热内卢狂欢节期间，一场名为“博伊托洛”的流动街头派对没有固定时间和路线，数千名狂欢者以狂热节奏在城市中穿行。
news.content0: The square started filling well before dawn. Some revelers arrived clad in neon fishnets and doused in glitter. Others, who had been at parties elsewhere, napped on a grassy patch. The musicians came last, lugging drums and trumpets.
news.author: NYTimes
